page.title: 11Blackland Holiday Centre
page.content:
During 1985 the{Blackland Lakes {Holiday and Leisure Centre}opened at {Knight's Marsh Farm, Stockley Lane. This is based around 3 lakes which are used for fishing, model boat sailing and as wildfowl reserves.
The fishing is both coarse (carp and tench) and fly fishing (rainbow trout). There are barbecue and picnic areas, a shop, a laundry, a unit for the disabled and an 8 acre caravan camping site.
There is also an equestrian centre with stabling for visitor's horses or ponies, riding and pony trekking, a cross-country course with 40 jumps and an outdoor, illuminated, all weather surfaced arena.
